poem:
**The Spectacle of Crashing**

We tune in, eyes wide,  
to the allure of chaos,  
these reels of calamity,  
the flicker of broken paths  
unspooling on our screens—  
a slow-motion wobble,  
the brilliance of a derailment,  
our hearts holding tight,  
not to the tracks,  
but to the thrill of the fall.
